inclusion.criterion: Patients with B-CLL (not in Richter's transformation) with measurable disease.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Procurement consent signed and faxed to Research Coordinator
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: HIV negative (can be pending at this time)
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Infected at time of protocol entry, or receiving antibiotics (other than prophylactic trimethoprim sulfamethoxazole).
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of CLL with large cell transformation, which may make them ineligible for the trial. They also have a rising white count and mildly elevated LDH, indicating possible infection or other exclusion criteria.
